title: The Beach Girls and the Monster

sources.title: The Beach Girls and the Monster
sources.description: A young girl is killed at the beach in Malibu. Professor Otto Lindsay (Jon Hall) suspects that it is some form of mutated fish. However, his son Richard (Arnold Lessing), who was a good friend of the girl, thinks that it is a madman who has a grudge against Richard and his friends. Soon the list of victims grows to include one of Rich's surfing buddies, Rich's bitchy stepmother Vicky (Sue Casey) and his friend Mark (Walker Edmiston) who was crippled in an auto accident. Audio Sync problem fixed

sources.title: The Beach Girls And The Monster ( 1965)
sources.description: Oceanographer Richard Lindsay gives up on his science career in favour of a new-found passion for surfing; but when a monster from the sea starts slaughtering kids on the beach, Dr Lindsay has to get to the bottom of it.

sources.title: The Beach Girls and the Monster (1965) Jon Hall, Sue Casey | Sci-Fi, Horror Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
Go! Go! Go! The Coolest Monster Shindig of Chicks and Chills!
What happens when a wave of mischief crashes onto the California coast? Surfers are vanishing, and whispers point to a strange figure lurking in the waves! Is it a misunderstood sea creature, a clever hoax, or something else entirely? Join a rebellious teenager, a skeptical scientist, and a group of fun-loving beach girls as they try to solve the puzzle before the next tide rolls in.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/pHN2ZeoSBwo

Writers: Joan Gardner, Robert Silliphant, Don Marquis
Stars: Jon Hall, Sue Casey, Walker Edmiston
Genre: B movie, Horror, Psychotronic film

üí£ Why Watch?
Pure 60s Vibes: Catch the sun, sand, and surf culture in full swing.
Iconic Monster: Witness the unforgettable creation that stirred up the shore!
Catchy Tunes: Features groovy music by Frank Sinatra Jr. and The Sea Bops!
Drive-In Legacy: Experience a true piece of Americana cinema history.
